how_artifical_int_smallInfo: Updating existing security systems with AI solutions is critical for retailers. Learn how it helps to prevent losses, better understand the security landscape and respond to threats more effectively.
interview_with_olivier_smallInfo: In the interview, an ex-commando officer and a risk and crisis management consultant, Oliver Schneider, speaks about his exciting experience and collaboration with Scylla.
edge_ai_solutions_smallInfo: Edge AI technology is a cost-effective, reliable, scalable and easy-to-use solution. Learn how edge AI solutions can be effectively used for physical security.
scylla_ai_power_smallInfo: Scylla Perimeter Intrusion Detection System is integrated with exacqVision from Johnson Controls for effective false alarm filtering and situational awareness.
best_practices_for_campus_smallInfo: These days AI-powered technologies offer solutions that can help curb numerous physical security threats that K-12 and higher educational establishments face.
scylla_lauches_smallInfo: We are launching a smart edge monitoring solution, Scylla Asteria™ for small-scale home and small business security installations
key_steps_in_active_smallInfo: Enhancing active shooter preparedness is a must for all organizations. Learn which steps businesses must take to improve active shooter response and physical security.
leveraging_ai_video_smallInfo: Cutting-edge physical security solutions help improve effectiveness of healthcare facilities providing round-the-clock monitoring, intelligent AI-based analytics and real-time incident notification.
